meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Water</kanji> with <kanji>salt</kanji> in it is <vocabulary>salt water</vocabulary>. Best not to drink 塩水.
readingMnemonic: The readings are the kun'yomi vocab readings. You know 塩's from the kanji and you know 水's from the vocab word 水. Combine them together and you have <reading>しおみず</reading>.
